title: Pessat admission process
content: What if I get the same seat which I have blocked through pessat through kcet, or if I were to leave the pessat seat altogether and join another college like RV or BMS, would the amount paid be refunded?

comments.body:
If you switch to kcet but stay in pes, they'll return the difference in fee

If you leave the college, they'll collect something like 2k per working day and return the rest
